buttons.title: The free, fun, and effective way to learn a language!

heading.title: The world's #1 way to learn a language
heading.description: Learning with Duolingo is fun, and research shows that it works! With quick, bite-sized lessons, you'll earn points and unlock new levels while gaining real-world communication skills.

reasons.title: Why you'll love learning with Duolingo
reasons.description: We combine proven teaching methods with fun, engaging lessons to help you learn effectively.

effective.title: Effective and efficient
effective.description: Our courses effectively and efficiently teach reading, listening, and speaking skills. Check out our latest research!

personalized.title: Personalized learning
personalized.description: Combining the best of AI and language science, lessons are tailored to help you learn at just the right level and pace.

motivated.title: Stay motivated
motivated.description: We make it easy to form a habit of language learning, with game-like features, fun challenges, and reminders from our friendly mascot, Duo the owl.

fun.title: Have fun with it!
fun.description: Effective learning doesn't have to be boring! Build your skills each day with engaging exercises and playful characters.

super.title: Boost your learning with Super Duolingo
super.free: Learning a language is completely free
super.description: But you can remove ads and support free education with Super.

mobile.title: Learn anytime, anywhere.
mobile.description: Make your breaks and commutes more productive with our iPhone and Android apps. Download them and see why Apple and Google gave us their highest accolades.

schools.title: Duolingo for Schools
schools.description: Free teacher tools to help students learn languages through the Duolingo app, both in and out of the classroom.

test.title: The Duolingo English Test
test.description: Welcome to the convenient, fast, and affordable English test accepted around the world. By integrating the latest assessment science and AI, we empower anyone to take the test where and when they're at their best.

research.title: Effective and efficient courses
research.description: Our courses effectively and efficiently teach reading, listening, and speaking skills. Check out our latest research!

footer.description: Transform your business with our powerful Duolingo platform. Scale faster, work smarter, grow bigger.

success.title: Email Verified!
success.subtitle: Your email has been successfully verified.
success.description: You can now log in to your account and start your language learning journey.
success.redirect: If you're not redirected automatically, click the button above.

error.title: Verification Failed
error.subtitle: We couldn't verify your email address.
error.description: The verification link may have expired or is invalid.
error.support: If you continue to have problems, please contact support.

loading.title: Verifying Email
loading.subtitle: Please wait while we verify your email address...
